        public void setUp()
        setup method to initialize Model's media players when Mockito injects mocks it does it based on mocks class, and does not take into consideration variable names that's why explicit configuration was needed

        public void shouldSetGameStateToLogin()
        This test uses Mockito framework.
        Testing the game state and music player.
